author: newsr.in
title: Some Guy Is Trying to Raise Money to Save Matt Damon from Mars
text: Ridley Scott's “ The Martian ” opened in theaters about a week and a half ago. Based on a novel by Andy Weir, it's pure science fiction from beginning to end. The thing is that, as it turns out, the fiction part is so convincing that some thought the movie to be based on real events. Not one to let an opportu... »
